features: Inset panels made of moisture-wicking fabric with four-way stretch and a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
High-waisted and ribbed waistband for less abrasion while backpacking
Two side drop-in pockets and one zippered security pocket
Durable panels at knees and seat for added abrasion resistance
Flat-seamed construction for a chafe-free fit
